register.description: This register determines how ingress global events from the ingress global event ETL are written out to the two egress global event ETL intefaces. The index of each of the two egress events is stored in this register, which is selected based in the ingress event index value. Offset = 0h + (j * 20h); where j = 0h to 1FFh for NAVSS0_UDMASS_INTA0_CFG_MCAST j = 0h to 7Fh for MCU_NAVSS0_UDMASS_INTA0_CFG_MCAST

bitfield.description: Global event index 1. This field specifies the index of the outgoing global event on ETL 1. Set to 0xFFFF to disable.
Global event index 0. This field specifies the index of the outgoing global event on ETL 0. Set to 0xFFFF to disable.
